Subject: Client Device Control
Description: On a few machines when i open the Client no devices are shown in the device control list.
What_We_Know__c: I have asked the customer to check either Windows updates or some Root Certificate Authorities that need to be installed on the machines (Global Sign related) as devs suggested.
Next_Steps__c:
Cristian will check with Adrian to make sure procedure is correct, before sending it out to the customer.
---
Waiting on devs to let us know which root certificate to check for.
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer confirmed the below steps resolved the issue.

1. Going into File Explorer and going to the EPP folder:
2. Accessing the Properties of the EPPNotifier -> Digital Signature Details -> View Certificate.
3. We will screenshot the certificate name and then look to see if it is missing.
4. We will check certmgr.msc -> Trusted Root Certification Authorities -> Certificates -> expand the Friendly name column.
5  We will compare to see if the screenshot-ed certificate is missing.
